name: Ultimate Leader
description:
Ultimate Leader is semi-casual leadership simulator for Android devices.

Take the role as a Head of State, solve problems delivered to you by your trusty advisers and make choices and keep your actions balanced or you soon find yourself replaced!

Team Flamingo Ninja:

Arttu Paldan - Programmer

Noora Soini - Programmer

Teemu Siiki - Artist

Tero Hyväluoma - Composer

Ville Heiskanen - Producer
